topics.body:
God damn it.


I have the worst sort of luck; the reoccuring bad luck that clings onto you like a political activist that can't take a hint.

So my school is going fine and all, but there's a hitch and big fucking hitch: my dentist bill has utterly fucked me cause it's by the same company for my student loans.  I have to find a job and pay off 2k in two months on top of taking a full class schedule and learning java at the same time and cooking and cleaning for the house.

Just fuck my life.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
